places.name: Magic Planet
places.desc: Magic Planet - the magic-themed complex - at the Kinfra Film and Video Park near Kazhakuttam, will facilitate an interesting journey, experiencing various eras of magic and exploring its rich history…

places.name: Kovalam Beach
places.desc: Kovalem beach is 22 kilometres away from the center of Trivandrum even it’s included in one day sightseeing in Trivandrum.The beach are so lovely,Peaceful it is not so busy like the other beaches.On the other hand light house is also located anyone can enjoy a beautiful view of beach & ocean from the top .
